type: Renewal of Support and Maintenance of 3PAR Appliance
short_summary: Renewal of 3PAR Appliance Maintenance and Support for OSGG
description: The bid for the following contract: 3PAR Appliance Maintenance and Support Renewal for OSGG from March 30, 2024 to March 29, 2027. The financial evaluation will be based on the total bid price and will be submitted through the P2P portal.
full_summary:
### 3PAR Appliance Maintenance and Support Renewal

#### Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: BPM020609/25242
*   **Publication Date**: January 18, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: February 8, 2024, 2:00 PM
*   **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
*   **End User Entity**: Shared Services Canada

#### Technical Specifications

*   **Classification**: Computer and Data Processing Services
*   **Category**: Service (SRV) & Service for the Trade (SRVTGD)
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

#### Tender Requirements

*   **Evaluation Criteria**: Total bid price, calculated from the sum of all total prices for deliverables (specified in Annex B)

#### Procedure and Timeline

*   **Bidder Registration**: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca)
*   **Submission Method**: P2P portal only
*   **Submission Deadline**: February 8, 2024, 2:00 PM
*   **Notice**: The P2P system will not permit submission after the solicitation closing

#### Contact Information

*   **Contact Person**: Sandra Ladouceur
*   **Email**: None
*   **Phone**: 613-302-0766
*   **Fax**: 613-960-6026
*   **Address**: [180 Kent Street, Ottawa, National Capital Region, Ontario, K1G 4A8](https://www.google.co.uk/maps/dir/+,+180+Kent+Street,+Ottawa,+ON+K1G+4A8)


Let me know if any modifications should be done.  Thank you!
